Work

Portfolio-Generator

Built With: JavaScript,HTML,CSS,ES6,Node

This allows a user to use node.js to run command line interfaces and produce a generated portfolio using inquirer and npm. By taking commands into the terminal, the computer automatically, asychronously, goes and finds the data needed to generate a proffesional looking portfolio.
